group_1.textCenter: (I knew absolutely nothing about them after all...)

group_1.textLeft: ...Looking back on it all,@many things have occurred up to this day.

group_1.textRight: Everything to spread the existence of Magical Girls,
and it all started with so many lives being lost...
I never would have thought that@we would all head to Kamihama.
That was quite unexpected.

group_1.textLeft: Together, all of you form a faction like the others,
so does that mean you have a specific goal@in Kamihama...?

group_1.textRight: Yes we do...
As we spoke of yesterday...
After so many sacrifices,@we came up with a hypothesis...
That if we are being controlled@by the will of the universe,
then it's senseless to do anything...
That there is no way to save Magical Girls. The more@we struggle, the more miserable we become...
Giving up is all there is.
The only thing we can do is give up...

group_1.textLeft: The hypothesis that Papa was talking about.

group_1.textRight: That's when Kyubey showed up...
There's a drive to spread the existence of@Magical Girls in Kamihama,
so to put a final test to the professor's hypothesis,@we'd need to go to Kamihama ourselves...

group_1.textLeft: If you spread the existence of Magical Girls,
the universe itself will eliminate you...
All of you share the goal in testing Papa's hypothesis@then?

group_1.textRight: ...At the current state, yes.

group_1.textLeft: (The current state...?@That's a worrying way of saying as such...)

group_1.textRight: As onlookers, we are observing the developments@in Kamihama.

group_1.textLeft: That is why we infiltrated each group.
Since I carry Tokime Clan blood,@I naturally entered the clan.

group_1.textRight: Since my affiliated school is close to Futatsugi,
and I'm a Futatsugi Magical Girl,
I slipped right into Promised Blood.
The Neo-Magius is a little special, though...
At first, I wanted to see how it would play out@from the perspective of former Wings of Magius,
so when I snuck in,@it wasn't an actual organization yet...
Even so,@I looked around for someone who could help
and made their team grow bigger.

group_1.textLeft: You must have had lots of help then, Sasha...

group_1.textRight: However, back then...
I never imagined the Neo-Magius would become@so radical.
I didn't think Hime would go this far...

group_1.textLeft: It's not your fault, Sasha.
I feel the results themselves@were the natural outcome.

group_1.textRight: ...I feel like I've done all I can too.

group_1.textCenter: (...I can feel the distance between us...)
(They are not avoiding me,@and we are standing in the same space, yet...)
(It feels like I alone am somewhere else...)

group_1.textRight: Is something the matter?@You suddenly seem unwell...

group_1.textLeft: It's not that...
(It's just...)
...I feel a little alienated from you all.

group_1.textRight: Alienated...?

group_1.textLeft: The mood between all of you is something only@you share...
It's not a space I can enter...
Or rather, there are just some places@that cannot be entered...

group_1.textRight: ...It's because unlike you, Lady Nayuta,@we have no hope.

group_1.textLeft: No hope...?
Because I have hope,@I cannot get any closer to all of you...?

group_1.textRight: ...That's right.@We are all connected by our resignation.
If you...
If you want to join us,@our Folklore of Zero...
Then please surrender your "hope" as well,@Lady Nayuta.
...Rabi, we're about to enter the city.

group_1.textLeft: ...I know.@All members, stay alert.

group_1.textCenter: (I should start bracing myself as well...)
